turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: hi, how can i help you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yeah, I need to order a couple of pizzas from a place called Bella Luna.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: sure, what would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Three medium thick crust pizzas for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, what toppings would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: One sausage, one pepperoni and one cheese.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, you are ordering 3 medium thick crust pizzas, 1 sausage, 1 pepperoni and 1 cheese, is that correct?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: your total will be $57, is that ok?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: would you like to dine in, pick up or have your order delivered?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: It's going to be for pickup.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: ok, your pizzas will be ready in 40 minutes and your receipt will be texted to you.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: can i help with anything else?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Nope, that's it. Thank you so much.
